trans:
In the series, we now see Seyran while she is putting herself into hell by saying yes in the wedding ceremony and signing it without realising, to a place where she said she will never be in again.
When we come to Ferit's part, we hear that he would never get married and have a child again in the trailer. But I think, like Seyran, we will see Ferit put himself in a similar situation unknowingly. So I guess, D who wants to break up with will show up in the progressing events with a bigger belly.
However, just as Seyran did not have a sexual relationship, Ferit did not have either (yes I still support thisğŸ˜Œ).
As I mentioned in the tweet I quoted if there is any sh*tty situation going on with S, there will be one with D too.
That's why I think that wedding is fake.
*According to my theory* D having a belly is not physically possible like Ferit said once.
Now you will ask me Sema how come they have never been in a relationship? This is only a matter of a sleeping pill dears. Though that woman has some stamina for the pills, they give her something every day but I don't believe that those are pills anyway, but that's another story.
